result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Steven C. ECKELBERG

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: All records scanned and verified.

The State moves to dismiss and read in all counts.  The defendant plead to a charge of violate harassment restraining order in 16 CM 58.  Motion granted.
The Court orders the $200.00 cash bail on this file be applied to attorney fees.
Minutes.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Plea hearing is set for 11-08-2016 at 8:30 a.m., Br. 3.
Plea date on November 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant in custody.
The report of Dr. Chapin has been reviewed by all parties.
The parties agree that, based on the defendants treatment, he is now competent to proceed in these matters.
NOT GUILTY pleas to all counts.  The matters are placed on the jury calendar.
The parties agree to amend bail to $500.00 recognizance bond with following conditions:
- Defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release;
- Defendant is to have no contact with Nicole Densow;
- Defendant must take psychotropic medications as prescribed.
Court grants the request to modify bail.
Status conference is set for 10-04-16 at 3:30 p.m.
Minutes.

Report of Lesley Chapin, Psy.D. (LOCATED IN 16 CM 58)
Cover sheet for Confidential Documents.

Writ of Habeas Corpus Ad Prosequendum and Order to Sheriff to transport defendant for a Status Conference on 08-31-2016 at 11:30 a.m.
Copy filed.
Status conference on August 31, 2016 at 11:30 am.
Status conference on August 31, 2016 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on August 23, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Petition for Appointment of Counsel;  Affidavit of Indigency.  Order Appointing Attorney Donald Chewning as counsel of record through Manitowoc County.
Report of Michael L. Hammer, Ph.D., Licensed Psychologist. (Found in case no: 16 CM 58)
Letter from Monica Zauner to Judge Fox.
Fax transmittal cover page.
Order of Commitment for Treatment.

Defendant in custody.   
Court finds on the report of Dr. Pankiewicz that the defendant is not competent to proceed.   Court will prepare an order to transport the defendant to Mendota.   Court further finds that the defendant is not competent to refuse medication.   
Minutes.
Review hearing on July 27, 2016 at 11:00 am.
Report of John Pankiewicz, M.D. Board Certified Psychiatrist. (ORIGINAL FILED IN 16 CM 58)
Competency hearing on April 27, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Notice from JLF in regards to bail forfeiture

Defendant in custody.   
Attorney Larson raises the issue of competency.   Court orders an examination of the defendant.   
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.   
Attorney Larson raises the issue of competency.   Court orders an examination of the defendant.

ADDRESS INFO for Steven C. ECKELBERG
Current: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 03-21-2016)
Prior: 953 N. 8th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

Defendant in custody on bench warrant appearing by video from Manitowoc County Jail.  The matter is continued for an initial appearance on 03-28-16 at 1:30 p.m.   Bail is set at $100.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours and provide a DNA sample and have no contact with Nicole Denis.   Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Bench warrant with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.

Notice of Bail/Bond Forfeiture.
Copies to DA and defendant.

Defendant failed to appear for an initial appearance.  State requests warrant.  Court authorizes warrant.
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Steven C. ECKELBERG
Current: 953 N. 8th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 02-22-2016)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220
$200.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.

Defendant in custody.
Defendant requests counsel and is referred to the public defender.   Initial appearance is reset to 02-29-16 at 1:30 p.m.
Notice.   
Minutes
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of stalking.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 02-22-16 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $200.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department  for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release, provide a DNA sample to Manitowoc City Police Department within 24 hours of release and have no contact with Nicole Densow.  Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Minutes.
RE:  Nicole Densow, on 02-05-16.
